entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
